mapper.select: SELECT t1.`name` AS NAME, t1.count, t2.count2, IF ( t1.count = 0, 0, t2.count2 / t1.count ) AS available FROM ( SELECT ta.activity_id, ta.`name`, count( tcl.clue_id ) AS count FROM tienchin_activity ta LEFT JOIN tienchin_clue tcl ON ta.activity_id = tcl.activity_id and tcl.create_time BETWEEN #{params.beginTime} and #{params.endTime} GROUP BY ta.activity_id ) t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ta.activity_id, ta.`name`, count( tcl.clue_id ) AS count2 FROM tienchin_activity ta LEFT JOIN tienchin_clue tcl ON ta.activity_id = tcl.activity_id and tcl.create_time BETWEEN #{params.beginTime} and #{params.endTime} AND tcl.`status` != 4 GROUP BY ta.activity_id ) t2 ON t1.activity_id = t2.activity_id
